TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlFormParameterReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader

summary.span: 读取使用 HTTP 实现的 Web 服务的传入请求参数，参数的名称/值对编码为类似 HTML 格式而不是编码为 SOAP 消息。

span.span: Reads incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP, with name-value pairs encoded like an HTML form rather than as a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和中的其他类命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读卡器序列化和反序列化，分别的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法的 HTTP 请求或响应流之间。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读卡器使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 服务端类提供方法来读取参数进行编码的名称-值对插入的 HTTP 请求正文部分的 MIME 类型与`application/x-www-form-urlencoded`。The service-side class provides a method to read parameter name-value pairs that are encoded into the body of an HTTP request with the MIME type `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`. 你通常不需要使用直接。You typically will not need to use directly. ASP.NET 配置文件时的 (Web.config) 启用 HTTP POST Web 服务[\<协议 > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3b301dc-855c-4062-8bcf-5ccadb598fab)元素包含[\<添加 > 元素\<协议>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abaa41b9-aa8b-469f-8ae5-e58c4d3a2921)元素其`name`特性的值是"HttpPost"。HTTP-POST Web services are enabled when an ASP.NET configuration file's (Web.config) [\ Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3b301dc-855c-4062-8bcf-5ccadb598fab) element contains an [\ Element for \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abaa41b9-aa8b-469f-8ae5-e58c4d3a2921) element whose `name` attribute's value is "HttpPost". 启用一个 HTTP POST Web 服务和收到适用的 HTTP 请求时，会自动使用类。The class is automatically used when an HTTP-POST Web service is enabled and an applicable HTTP request is received.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object[] Read(class System.Web.HttpRequest request) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (request As HttpRequest) As Object()

param.name: request
param.span: 一个 对象，其中包含编码到 HTTP 请求正文中的 HTML 名称/值对。

span.span: An object containing HTML name-value pairs encoded in the body of an HTTP request.

summary.span: 将名称/值对读入 Web 方法参数值。

span.span: Reads name-value pairs into Web method parameter values.

returns.span: 对象数组包含名称/值对。

span.span: An array of objects contain the name-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用的内容对象的属性。The method uses the content of the object's property.
